#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
  long   int ch,t,i=0;
    char a[100009];
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        i=0;
        cin>>a;
        while(a[i]!='\0')
        {

            ch=(a[i]-'0')*10+a[i+1]-'0';
            if(ch<32)
            {
                ch=(ch*10)+a[i+2]-'0';
                putchar(ch);
                i=i+3;
            }
            else
            {
                putchar(ch);
                i+=2;
            }
            if(a[i]=='\0')
                cout<<"\n";


        }

    }

    return 0;
}
